itunes:title: GYM BROS TELL ALL with Darian & Bobby
title: GYM BROS TELL ALL with Darian & Bobby
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
It's the most dramatic episode in Fun & Gains history— gym bros tell all, is here! This week, Britt is joined by Darian (GOAT husband & father) and their good friend Bobby (fulltime gym bro & part time firefighter) to answer your deepest, darkest questions. The gentlemen share their thoughts on male body image, approaching your gym crush, gym rivals, grunts, choosing a spotter, attractive things girls do in the gym, sweat marks, staring & so much more.

2:05 NEW MERCH DROP

20:50 attractive things girls do in the gym

25:28 strategy when asking for a spotter

27:15 male nips

28:40 gym bro outfit rules

36:45 what causes the grunt vs the snake hiss
